entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Charlottetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:56 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -8.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 03:00 AM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -8.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.1 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 79 %
Wind Chill: -11
Dewpoint: -11.7°C
Wind: ENE 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early this evening. Wind becoming east 20 km/h this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 17. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning and minus 4 in the afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM AST Tuesday 28 February 2023
